about_the_game:
The demo includes only the initial mission. Utilizing advanced AI, you can replay the mission many times against the different enemy tactics.

Key Features:
Dynamic AI Learning: The game features AI that evolves and learns from player interactions, enhancing its tactics over time.
Open World Exploration: Players can explore a futuristic world where choices impact the narrative and interactions with AI and human characters.
Strategic Combat: Combat is not just about reflexes but also about strategic planning and adapting to evolving AI behaviours.

Why It’s Compelling:
"This game offers a unique blend of immersive storytelling, strategic gameplay, and cutting-edge AI technology, providing a fresh and engaging experience for players."

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence.

detailed_description:
The demo includes only the initial mission. Utilizing advanced AI, you can replay the mission many times against the different enemy tactics.

Key Features:
Dynamic AI Learning: The game features AI that evolves and learns from player interactions, enhancing its tactics over time.
Open World Exploration: Players can explore a futuristic world where choices impact the narrative and interactions with AI and human characters.
Strategic Combat: Combat is not just about reflexes but also about strategic planning and adapting to evolving AI behaviours.

Why It’s Compelling:
"This game offers a unique blend of immersive storytelling, strategic gameplay, and cutting-edge AI technology, providing a fresh and engaging experience for players."
name: Robabekya Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 | AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 780 (3 GB) | AMD Radeon R9 290 (4 GB)
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770K | Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 (6 GB) | AMD Radeon RX 580 (8 GB)
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Required

short_description: You envision a futuristic scenario where humans coexist in an open world alongside robots disguised with human-like skins, equipped with dynamic and adaptive system where AI learns from previous engagements, adjusts tactics, and becomes increasingly proficient in combat scenarios.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
